name: nfss
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

stmt.origin: nfxfr(s0, wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
stmt.pretty: nfxfr(s0, c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1))
